item.title: <fx-droptarget>
item.description:
Description

fx-droptarget only applies when using Drag and Drop is used and acts as a sink for HTML draggable elements. fx-droptarget can and often will be a draggable element itself.

To enable Drag and Drop operation add the draggable attribute to the respective elements and add as many fx-droptarget elements as needed.
